revised_title: Impact Analysis of Ideal Fibre-Reinforced Rigid-Plastic Plates
tldr: The authors present a theoretical model for the impact analysis of fibre-reinforced rigid-plastic plates, focusing on the deformation and stress behavior of anisotropic materials. They develop a simple model for plates with inextensible fibers in two or more directions and provide solutions for transverse impact problems, considering a general class of yield functions and strain-hardening relations.
